title: Street Food Vocabulary
description: Explore the colorful vocabulary of street food from markets and stalls around the world

questions.question: What is 'poutine', a famous Canadian street food?
options: French fries topped with cheese curds and brown gravy

questions.question: In street food culture, what is a 'banh mi'?
options: A Vietnamese sandwich on a crispy baguette with pickled vegetables, herbs, and meat

questions.question: What is 'arepas' in South American street food?
options: Flatbreads made from ground corn dough, often stuffed or topped with fillings

questions.question: What are 'takoyaki' in Japanese street food?
options: Ball-shaped snacks made from wheat flour batter filled with diced octopus

questions.question: In street food, what is a 'doner kebab'?
options: Grilled meat cubes on a stick
Seasoned meat stacked on a vertical rotisserie, sliced off and served in bread or a wrap

questions.question: What is 'jerk' in Caribbean street food?
options: A style of spicy seasoning and cooking method using a hot pepper and allspice marinade

questions.question: What are 'empanadas' in Latin American street food?
options: Stuffed pastries that are baked or fried, filled with meat, cheese, or other ingredients

questions.question: In Indian street food, what is 'chaat'?
options: A category of savory snacks featuring a mix of crunchy, tangy, spicy, and sweet flavors

questions.question: What is a 'crepe' as sold by French street vendors?
options: A very thin, large pancake made from wheat flour, served with sweet or savory fillings

questions.question: What is 'bunny chow' in South African street food?
options: A hollowed-out loaf of bread filled with curry

questions.question: In Filipino street food, what is 'balut'?
options: A fertilized duck egg with a partially developed embryo, boiled and eaten from the shell

questions.question: What is 'currywurst' in German street food?
options: A steamed and fried pork sausage cut into slices and topped with curry-flavored ketchup

questions.question: What are 'pupusas' in Salvadoran street food?
options: Thick corn tortillas stuffed with cheese, beans, or pork and griddled until crispy

questions.question: In Turkish street food, what is 'simit'?
options: A circular bread encrusted with sesame seeds, similar in shape to a bagel

questions.question: What is 'pani puri' (or 'gol gappa') in Indian street food?
options: Hollow, crispy spheres filled with flavored water, tamarind chutney, and potato
